SEARCH

Class LoginControllerTest

java.lang.Object
LoginControllerTest
public class LoginControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive Unit Test suite for the LoginController class.

This suite ensures high code coverage and reliability by verifying:

  • Input validation logic (empty fields).
  • File I/O operations (file existence, parsing logic).
  • Authentication mechanisms (valid/invalid credentials).
  • Role-based redirection logic (Admin, Librarian, User).

It utilizes JavaFX Platform tools to simulate UI interactions safely without requiring a physical display.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginControllerTest

      public LoginControllerTest()
      Default constructor for LoginControllerTest.

  • Method Details

    • initToolkit

      @BeforeAll static void initToolkit()
      Initializes the JavaFX Toolkit once before all tests execution. This prevents "Toolkit not initialized" errors during UI component instantiation.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test method.

      Instantiates the controller and injects mock JavaFX components using reflection to bypass FXML injection requirements.

      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection access fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown() throws IOException
      Cleans up resources after each test method. Removes the temporary users file to ensure test isolation.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file deletion fails.

    • testHandleLogin_EmptyFields

      @Test void testHandleLogin_EmptyFields() throws InterruptedException
      Verifies that the login handler rejects empty username or password fields.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testHandleLogin_FileNotFound

      @Test void testHandleLogin_FileNotFound() throws InterruptedException
      Verifies behavior when the user database file does not exist.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testHandleLogin_InvalidCredentials

      @Test void testHandleLogin_InvalidCredentials() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Verifies that valid inputs but incorrect credentials result in a failure message.
      Throws:
      IOException - if creating the test file fails.
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testValidateCredentials_ParsingEdgeCases

      @Test void testValidateCredentials_ParsingEdgeCases() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Verifies the robustness of the file parsing logic.

      Ensures the parser correctly handles:

      • Empty lines.
      • Lines with whitespace only.
      • Malformed data formats.
      Throws:
      IOException - if creating the test file fails.
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testRoleFlow_Admin

      @Test void testRoleFlow_Admin() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Verifies the authentication and redirection flow for an Admin user.
      Throws:
      IOException - if creating the test file fails.
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testRoleFlow_Librarian

      @Test void testRoleFlow_Librarian() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Verifies the authentication and redirection flow for a Librarian user.
      Throws:
      IOException - if creating the test file fails.
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testRoleFlow_User_Defaults

      @Test void testRoleFlow_User_Defaults() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Verifies the authentication and redirection flow for a standard User. Also tests the default values logic when optional fields are missing.
      Throws:
      IOException - if creating the test file fails.
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.
